text: This Is Us star Chrissy Metz rocked a burgundy latex dress to the MTV Movie and TV Awards Sunday night. She looked incredible, and she knew it — and refused to hear anything otherwise. She wore the custom Jane Doe Latex dress to present the award for Best Duo alongside her costar, Milo Ventimiglia, and clearly upstaged him : And that was even after she changed into a gorgeous blue dress for the Beauty and the Beast - themed opening number. Changing in and out of latex quickly? That deserves its own award. Getty Images But apparently, not everybody was too happy with Metz ’ s look, and snarked about her size online.
